verses.verse: Run back and forth <S%H7751><s%> through the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> now <S%H3045><s%>, and know, and seek <S%H1245><s%> in the broad places <S%H7339><s%> there <S%H4672><s%>, if you can find a man <S%H376><s%>, if there be <S%H3426><s%> any that executes <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>, that seeks <S%H1245><s%> the truth <S%H530><s%>; and I will pardon it <S%H5545><s%>.
And though they say <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives <S%H2416><s%>; surely they swear <S%H7650><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%>.

O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, are not your eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon the truth <S%H530><s%>? you have stricken <S%H5221><s%> them <S%H2342><s%>, but they have not grieved; you have consumed <S%H3615><s%> them <S%H3985><s%>, but they have refused to receive <S%H3947><s%> correction <S%H4148><s%>: they have made their faces <S%H6440><s%> harder <S%H2388><s%> than a rock <S%H5553><s%>; they have refused <S%H3985><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%>.

Therefore I said <S%H559><s%>, Surely these are poor <S%H1800><s%>; they are foolish <S%H2973><s%>: for they know <S%H3045><s%> not the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, nor the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of their God <S%H430><s%>.

I will go <S%H3212><s%> unto the great men <S%H1419><s%>, and will speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H3045><s%>; for they have known the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of their God <S%H430><s%>: but these have altogether <S%H3162><s%> broken <S%H7665><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%>, and burst <S%H5423><s%> the bonds <S%H4147><s%>.

Therefore a lion <S%H738><s%> out of the forest <S%H3293><s%> shall kill <S%H5221><s%> them <S%H2061><s%>, and a wolf of the evenings <S%H6160><s%> shall plunder <S%H7703><s%> them <S%H5246><s%>, a leopard shall watch <S%H8245><s%> over their cities <S%H5892><s%>: every one that goes out <S%H3318><s%> there shall <S%H2007><s%> be torn in pieces <S%H2963><s%>: because their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are many <S%H7231><s%>, and their backslidings <S%H4878><s%> are increased <S%H6105><s%>.

How <S%H335><s%> shall I pardon <S%H5545><s%> you for this <S%H2063><s%>? your sons <S%H1121><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me <S%H7650><s%>, and sworn by them that are no <S%H3808><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>: when I had fed them to the full <S%H7650><s%>, they then committed adultery <S%H5003><s%>, and assembled themselves by troops <S%H1413><s%> in the harlots <S%H2181><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>.
They were as fed <S%H2109><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> in the morning <S%H7904><s%>: every one <S%H376><s%> neighed <S%H6670><s%> after his neighbors <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>.
Shall I not visit <S%H6485><s%> for these things <S%H5002><s%>? says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and shall not my soul <S%H5315><s%> be avenged <S%H5358><s%> on such a nation as this <S%H1471><s%>?

Go you up <S%H5927><s%> upon her walls <S%H8284><s%>, and destroy <S%H7843><s%>; but make <S%H6213><s%> not a full end <S%H3617><s%>: take away <S%H5493><s%> her battlements <S%H5189><s%>; for they are not the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s.

For the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> have dealt very <S%H898><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> against me <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

They have denied <S%H3584><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, It is not he <S%H7451><s%>; neither shall evil come <S%H935><s%> upon us <S%H7200><s%>; neither shall we see sword <S%H2719><s%> nor famine <S%H7458><s%>:
And the prophets <S%H5030><s%> shall become wind <S%H7307><s%>, and the word <S%H1696><s%> is not in them <S%H6213><s%>: thus shall it be done unto them.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, Because you speak <S%H1696><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%>, behold <S%H5414><s%>, I will make my words <S%H1697><s%> in your mouth <S%H6310><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>, and this people <S%H5971><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and it shall devour them <S%H398><s%>.

Behold <S%H935><s%>, I will bring a nation <S%H1471><s%> upon you from far <S%H4801><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: it is a mighty <S%H386><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>, it is a ancient <S%H5769><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>, a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose language <S%H3956><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H8085><s%>, neither understand what they say <S%H1696><s%>.
Their quiver <S%H827><s%> is as a open <S%H6605><s%> tomb <S%H6913><s%>, they are all mighty men <S%H1368><s%>.

And they shall eat up <S%H398><s%> your harvest <S%H7105><s%>, and your bread <S%H3899><s%>, which your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> should eat <S%H398><s%>: they shall eat up <S%H398><s%> your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds <S%H1241><s%>: they shall eat up <S%H398><s%> your vines <S%H1612><s%> and your fig trees <S%H8384><s%>: they shall impoverish <S%H7567><s%> your fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, where you <S%H2007><s%> trusted <S%H982><s%>, with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.
Nevertheless in those days <S%H3117><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, I will not make <S%H6213><s%> a full end with you <S%H3617><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H559><s%>, when you shall say, Why <S%H8478><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> do all these things unto us <S%H559><s%>? then shall you answer them <S%H5800><s%>, Just as you have forsaken me <S%H5647><s%>, and served strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%>, so shall you serve <S%H5647><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> in a land that is not yours <S%H776><s%>.
Declare <S%H5046><s%> this in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and publish <S%H8085><s%> it in Judah <S%H3063><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Hear <S%H8085><s%> now this <S%H5530><s%>, O foolish people <S%H5971><s%>, and without understanding <S%H3820><s%>; which have eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> not <S%H241><s%>; which have ears, and hear not <S%H8085><s%>:

Fear <S%H3372><s%> you not me <S%H5002><s%>? says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: will you not tremble <S%H2342><s%> at my presence <S%H6440><s%>, which have placed <S%H7760><s%> the sand <S%H2344><s%> for the bound <S%H1366><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> decree <S%H2706><s%>, that it cannot pass <S%H5674><s%> it <S%H1530><s%>: and though the waves there toss <S%H1607><s%> themselves <S%H3201><s%>, yet can they not prevail; though they roar <S%H1993><s%>, yet can they not pass over it <S%H5674><s%>?
But this people <S%H5971><s%> has a revolting <S%H5637><s%> and a rebellious <S%H4784><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>; they have revolted <S%H5493><s%> and are gone <S%H3212><s%>.

Neither say <S%H559><s%> they in their heart <S%H3824><s%>, Let us now fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, that gives <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%>, both the former <S%H3138><s%> and the latter <S%H4456><s%>, in his season <S%H6256><s%>: he reserves <S%H8104><s%> unto us the appointed <S%H2708><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> of the harvest <S%H7105><s%>.
Your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have turned away <S%H5186><s%> these things <S%H2403><s%>, and your sins have withheld <S%H4513><s%> good things from you <S%H2896><s%>.

For among my people <S%H5971><s%> are found <S%H4672><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%> men <S%H7789><s%>: they lay wait, as he that sets <S%H7918><s%> snares <S%H3353><s%>; they set <S%H5324><s%> a trap <S%H4889><s%>, they catch <S%H3920><s%> men <S%H582><s%>.

As a cage <S%H3619><s%> is full <S%H4392><s%> of birds <S%H5775><s%>, so are their houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of deceit <S%H4820><s%>: therefore they are become great <S%H1431><s%>, and grown rich <S%H6238><s%>.

They are grown fat <S%H8080><s%>, they shine <S%H6245><s%>: Yes <S%H5674><s%>, they overpass the deeds <S%H1697><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%>: they judge <S%H1777><s%> not the cause <S%H1779><s%>, the cause of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, yet they prosper <S%H6743><s%>; and the right <S%H4941><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%> do they not judge <S%H8199><s%>.
Shall I not visit <S%H6485><s%> for these things <S%H5002><s%>? says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: shall not my soul <S%H5315><s%> be avenged <S%H5358><s%> on such a nation as this <S%H1471><s%>?
A wonderful <S%H8047><s%> and horrible thing <S%H8186><s%> is committed <S%H1961><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>;

The prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> carry rule <S%H7287><s%> by their means <S%H3027><s%>; and my people <S%H5971><s%> love <S%H157><s%> to have it so <S%H6213><s%>: and what will you do in the end there <S%H319><s%>?
